remarks: The orthogonal complement of the closure of a subset is the same as the orthogonal complement of the subset itself.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Oct-2015.)
statement:
clsocv.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
clsocv.o $e |- O = ( ocv ` W ) $.
clsocv.j $e |- J = ( TopOpen ` W ) $.
clsocv $p |- ( ( W e. CPreHil /\ S C_ V ) -> ( O ` ( ( cls ` J ) ` S ) ) = ( O ` S ) ) $.
